description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/05/2006

Bridget and Dante try and come up with a plan to stop Stephanie from interfering in their involvement with Dino. Taylor visits Nick and questions if Nick is worried that Brooke won’t be able to leave Forrester Creations. Ridge begs Brooke to stay at Forrester Creations. Brooke gives Ridge one last kiss and leaves. After Brooke leaves Ridge tells Stephanie this is all her fault.  Ridge is obviously upset.  He then grabs his chest and collapses.
